ISSUE.TITLE: Passing email and password to --login flag?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I don't see a way to automate logging into `now` via the command line. For example, how would I be able to deploy with `now` using travis? Passing `--login` flag prompts for checking email and clicking link. Is there a way for me to pass in my email and password and have the `now` authenticate me directly?
